overview: Sakharam B is a Hindi play starring Nachiket Purnapatre, Anuja Sathe, Chitrangada Chakraborty and Chandrashekhar Dutta. Sakharam, a stubborn, brash Mumbai cop, finds himself stuck between two women, the conventional Laxmi and the aggressive Champa. The play examines the inevitable power struggle between a man and woman. Sakharam, a rebel against society, becomes a victim of his own ego and dominance.
title: Sakharam B.
